text: 3:3 Matyu 24:43-44; Luk 12:39-40; 1 Tesalonika 5:2; 5:6; 1 Timoti 6:20; 2 Pita 3:10; Akar Mogomem 2:5; 16:15Akar aghuir ia fomɨram oregha inizir kam, ia uam a gɨnɨghnɨgh. Egh ia navibagh iragh, bar deravɨram an gɨn mangɨ. Ia osegh daguraguim ateghan koghtɨ, kɨ okɨmakɨar gumazim izi moghɨn, ia batogham. Eghtɨ ia dughiar kɨ ia bagh izamim gɨfoghan kogham.
